summary: PETALING JAYA: Clarity has emerged on the distribution of shares in Hong Kong-listed NagaCorp Ltd according to the wishes of its late founder Tan Sri Dr Chen Lip Keong.
content:
PETALING JAYA: Clarity has emerged on the distribution of shares in Hong Kong-listed NagaCorp Ltd according to the wishes of its late founder Tan Sri Dr Chen Lip Keong.

Filings by NagaCorp Ltd in Hong Kong reveal that eldest son Chen Yiy Fon is entitled to around 368 millions shares, which have a worth of some RM1bil and represents around 8.3% in NagaCorp.

Yiy Fon was made the group’s chief executive officer following the demise of Lip Keong on Dec 8 last year.

title: Allianz Malaysia declares interim dividend of 26.5 sen
summary: Life and general insurance provider Allianz Malaysia Bhd (KL:ALLIANZ) has declared a first interim dividend of 26.5 sen per share for the financial year ending Dec 31, 2024 (FY2024).
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (May 13): Life and general insurance provider Allianz Malaysia Bhd (KL:ALLIANZ) has declared a first interim dividend of 26.5 sen per share for the financial year ending Dec 31, 2024 (FY2024).

This is five sen lower than the 31.5 sen per share the group declared a year earlier.

The dividend’s ex-date is May 28, and it is payable on June 12, according to the group filing with Bursa Malaysia on Monday.
